article.title: Decision/Analysis Partners Receives $5 Million Award with U.S. Coast Guard for Logistics Operations Support
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Coast Guard has awarded a three-year, $5 million contract to Decision/Analysis Partners LLC, which will provide analytic support to the Coast Guard's Logistics Transformation Program Integration Office by developing and managing logistics requirements and assessing risks and other services aimed at improving logistics operations.
